ResearchProjectDef.label: psychite refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Refine psychoid leaves into flake and yayo, different forms of the euphoric psychite drug.

ResearchProjectDef.label: wake-up production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synthesize wake-up, a work performance-enhancing drug which replaces the need for sleep.

ResearchProjectDef.label: go-juice production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce go-juice, a synthetic combat-performance-enhancing drug which improves shooting, melee, and movement ability, and dulls pain.

ResearchProjectDef.label: penoxycyline production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce penoxycline, a disease prevention drug which blocks plague, malaria, and more before they start.

ResearchProjectDef.label: long blades
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft longswords and spears.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plate armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Smith suits of plate armor from metal or wood.

ResearchProjectDef.label: greatbow
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft greatbows for killing enemies at great range.

ResearchProjectDef.label: battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build batteries for storing electricity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: biofuel refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build biofuel refineries to make chemfuel from biological matter like wood or foodstuffs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: waterproof conduit
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build underwater electrical conduits.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nutrient paste
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build nutrient paste dispensers which efficiently produce edible meals from raw nutritive feedstocks, while requiring no labor at all.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar panel
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build solar panels for electricity generation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: air conditioning
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build coolers to make people comfortable in hot weather, or to construct freezers for storing perishable goods.

ResearchProjectDef.label: autodoor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build autodoors which automatically open when someone approaches, without slowing anyone down.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build hydroponics basins to rapidly grow crops indoors regardless of the terrain or weather outside.

ResearchProjectDef.label: electric smelting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build electric smithy and smelters.\n\nThe electric smithy allows smithing items without fuel. The electric smelter extracts useful metal from slag chunks and other items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: packaged survival meal
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce packaged survival meals which never go bad. Great for traveling.

ResearchProjectDef.label: electric cremation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build crematoriums for vaporizing unwanted corpses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: colored lights
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct colored lights for decorative purposes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: IEDs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build improvised traps from any kind of mortar shell.

ResearchProjectDef.label: geothermal power
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build geothermal power plants on top of steam geysers, for uninterrupted power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: machining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build machining tables to craft guns and machinery, or to disassemble dead mechanoids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mortars
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build mortars which can lob shells long distances - even over walls.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smokepop belts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build smokepop belts which generate an automatic defensive smokescreen when the user is shot.

ResearchProjectDef.label: prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build inexpensive prosthetic body parts to replace lost limbs. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gunsmithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft simple manually-operated guns like revolvers, pump shotguns, bolt-action rifles, and incendiary launchers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: blowback operation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft low-power blowback-operated guns like autopistols, machine pistols, and heavy SMGs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gas operation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft high-power guns like chain shotguns and LMGs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: precision rifling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft precisely-machined guns like assault rifles and sniper rifles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: microelectronics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Work with complex microelectronics. This unlocks the high-tech research bench and comms console.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tube television
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce tube televisions for recreational watching.

ResearchProjectDef.label: flatscreen television
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce high-resolution flatscreen televisions for greater enjoyment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gun turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce simple automated gun turrets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: autocannon turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the heavy, long-ranged autocannon turret.
